description: Equipment fan failure due to hardware problem.

event.Summary: DSLAM fan $v2 failed because of hardware problem

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: Fan number on the fan tray. This object
is intended to be returned only as a
varbind for a notification, therefore
reading this variable is normally undefined.
variables.name: ADTRAN-TAMINIDSLAM3G-MIB::adGenMiniDslam3gInfoFanNumber

description: Equipment fan failure alarm cleared.

event.Summary: DSLAM fan failure alarm cleared; Slot: $v1

description: Indication that a problem occured while
a config restore or save was attempted.
Points to a flash/filesystem problem.

the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: Indication that the customer use OID (aka Circuit ID) was
changed for the referenced port.

event.Summary: Customer used aka circuit ID changed on $v2

description: A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: This object is intended to be returned only as a varbind
for the adGenMiniDslamAdslCircuitIdChange notification below.
This object is a comma delimited list of all the ports and associated
ports which have changed and has the following format:
portnumA/ifTypeA:circuitIdA,portnumB/ifTypeB:circuitIdB[,...].
The portnum given is the same as the port's adGenPortInfoIndex
ifTypeA is the same as the port's adGenIfTypeIndex.
variables.name: ADTRAN-TAMINIDSLAM3G-MIB::adGenMiniDslam3gInfoCircuitIdChanges

description: A loss of span power was detected on a span power
channel. The varbind adGenMiniDslam3gSpanPowerChannel
indicates which channel was responsible for
the condition.
A unique value for each slot. Its value may exceed
the value of adGenSlotNumber if pseudo slot numbers
are used for some bank commons or multiplexers.
This object is visible for all rows.
variables.name: ADTRAN-GENSLOT-MIB::adGenSlotInfoIndex

description: Number of the span power channel.
variables.name: ADTRAN-TAMINIDSLAM3G-MIB::adGenMiniDslam3gSpanPowerChannel

This object is visible for all rows.

description: Number of the span power channel.
